title: BRIEF-Command Security - Award Of A New Five-Year Contract To Provide Security And Merchandise Screening Services For Laguardia Airport
text:
Market News  15 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Command Security - Award Of A New Five-Year Contract To Provide Security And Merchandise Screening Services For Laguardia Airport Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 23 (Reuters) - Command Security Corp: 
* COMMAND SECURITY CORP - AWARD OF A NEW FIVE-YEAR CONTRACT TO PROVIDE SECURITY AND MERCHANDISE SCREENING SERVICES FOR LAGUARDIA AIRPORT 
* COMMAND SECURITY CORP - TOTAL REVENUES ASSOCIATED WITH THIS AWARD ARE ESTIMATED TO BE APPROXIMATELY $23.0 MILLION WILL COMMENCE ON OR ABOUT JUNE 1, 2018 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
